channel.title: Whats up with Dark Bow range xp?
channel.description:
hey guys, i have managed to add darkbow to my server, only problem is that when you range with it, instead of getting range XP you get the xp you would get from a sword. For example (attack, str, defence XP.)
If anybody can be kind enough to post or link me to a tutorial then thats great.
Harry.

item.title: Whats up with Dark Bow range xp?
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:

mann sec i don’t remember what you need seatch… =P i dimiss so many time i don’t work with bows

Read full topic
